TEXT.TITLE: ONTARIO TREASURY BILL YIELD EDGES UP
TEXT.BODY: This week's Ontario government auction of 50 mln dlrs worth of 91-day treasury bills yielded an average of 7.28 pct, up slightly from 7.26 pct last week, a treasury department spokesman said. Average price was 98.217. Reuter
